job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
SUMMARY: Apex Systems has an immediate opening for a Machine Learning Engineer for a client in the financial services industry. The position is a contract-to-hire, offering a competitive compensation package. The successful candidate must come from a machine learning environment and have Java development experience.


This is a great opportunity to get your foot in the door with a large IT company to grow with internally!


***Must be USC or Green Card No C2C****


ROLE: Machine Learning Engineer

TERM: Long term contract to hire

LOCATION: Remote (company in Rockville, MD)


QUALIFICATIONS:


  • Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science or related field. 
  • Core Java
  • 4+ years Machine Learning experience
  • AWS Core Services
  • Experience with web based technologies, specifically HTML
